block.p: Baseball National League SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS -- Signed Gary Sharko and Dan Henrikson, pitchers, to minor-league contracts.
Baseball National League SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS -- Signed Gary Sharko and Dan Henrikson, pitchers, to minor-league contracts.

Basketball Atlantic Basketball Association SCRANTON-WILKES-BARRRE MINERS -- Signed Jeff Stern, center. Boxing NEVADA STATE ATHLETIC COMMISSION -- Lifted its suspension of Evander Holyfield, heavyweight. Football National Football League BUFFALO BILLS -- Signed Ted Washington, nose tackle. CAROLINA PANTHERS -- Signed Randy Baldwin, running back-kick returner. DENVER BRONCOS -- Signed James Jones, defensive tackle, to a three-year contract and Michael Dean Perry, defensive tackle. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS -- Signed Chris Gardocki, punter. LOS ANGELES RAIDERS -- Signed Steve Wisniewski, guard, to a three-year contract. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS -- Re-signed Andy McCollum, center-guard, to a one-year contract. NEW YORK GIANTS -- Signed Jesse Campbell, safety. Arena Football League ORLANDO PREDATORS -- Signed Pat O'Hara, quarterback. Hockey National Hockey League DALLAS STARS -- Assigned Travis Richards, defenseman, and Jarkko Varvio, right wing, to Kalamazoo of the International Hockey League. NEW YORK ISLANDERS -- Recalled Gord Dineen, defenseman, from Denver of the International Hockey League. Sent Milan Tichy, defenseman, to Denver. Horse Racing NEW YORK STATE RACING AND WAGERING BOARD -- Suspended D. Wayne Lukas, trainer, for 60 days because one on his horses tested positive for Isoxsuprine on Sept. 17, 1994 at Belmont Park. Soccer National Professional Soccer League CLEVELAND CRUNCH -- Re-signed Dewan Bader, defender, to a two-year contract. Named Creg Jantz director of media relations. U.S. Interregional Soccer League LONG ISLAND ROUGH RIDERS -- Extended the contract of Chris Armas, midfielder, for two years through the 1996 season.
